about_the_game:
Step into the bustling city of Salamanca in the 1910s, a place where tradition and innovation meet! In Toymaker: Threads of Joy, you'll experience the art of toy crafting and the thrill of managing your very own shop. More than just any ordinary business venture, Toymaker is a journey filled with magic, folklore, and enchanting locales.

Each toy you craft and decision you make carries weight - will you uphold traditions of the past, or forge a new path? Dive into this enchanting blend of simulation, storytelling and management, where every moment is a chance to create something truly magical!

Crafting with Care

It's up to you to define what the next cherished plushie will be! Experience a chill and cozy crafting workshop. Unlock and collect materials, colors and patterns, sew the toy together and add beautiful details to craft the perfect toy for their next adopter - with no time constraint, just creativity!

Storefront Success

As the word gets out about your shop, customers will commission new toys and haggle for a better price. Make sure you understand their needs though! Your reputation will grow or decrease depending on your clientele’s treatment - a happy patron will recommend you to their friends!

Magical Narrative

Get to know your customers, and they’ll reward you with hidden stories and mysteries. Visit emblematic locations in Salamanca - its markets, squares, university and even the countryside! - in a captivating journey inspired by a folk legend and mythology.

Pathway Possibilities

Shape the destiny of Salamanca by following two distinct mythic paths with their own perks and storyline. Your choice will influence the future of the town and the legacy of your toy shop, so pick wisely!

  • Relaxing casual gameplay with rewarding interactions

  • Gorgeous art nouveau style

  • Super cute plushies (*^_^*)

  • Lovely piano music inspired in the 1910s and folk music from Castille

short_description: Toymaker is a toy-crafting and store management simulator set in the 1910s Spain. Meet unique customers and colorful locals in a bustling city, and discover a magical story based on a folk legend. Follow two different mythic paths, and change the future of your hometown!
